r.s: The UNL HTML Templates as a PEAR Package.
r.d: This package allows you to render UNL Template styled pages using PHP Objects.
r.n: Updates the package to use the new 2006-08 UNL Templates. Template dependents /ucomm/templatedependents/ are still required outside of this package. Added new replacement functions to handle the template dependent replacements. Removed evalPHPFile function... not needed anymore.
